DOC.brief_summary: This study partially replicate two previous study normal weight woman , overweight woman . Both found woman could compensate sucrose added diet carbonate soft drink ( 4 x250ml total1800 kJ per day ) give blind period 4 week . The hypothesis applies also obese woman , gain weight , increase overall energy intake diet , eat differently whilst consume sucrose . 42 participant shall randomly assign either give carbonate drink contain sucrose , drink artificially sweeten .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Sugar Sucrose Bodyweight Energy Intake Over 28 Days Obese Women
